Only three teams in NBA playoff history have forced a Game 7 after trailing the series 0-3.

1951 New York Knicks (Finals)
1994 Denver Nuggets (Conference Semis)
2003 Portland Trail Blazers (First Round)

All three teams lost in Game 7, by an average of 9 points.
